entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
